      Checks if the player received any items from the enemy.
      static void Board.attack(Characters firstChar, Characters enemyChar)
      Runs the calculation for an enemy attack.
      static void Board.battleState(Characters firstChar, Characters enemyChar)
      Prints out the battle menu, then prompts the user for an action.
      void EventsHandling.chanceEncounter(Characters firstChar)
      Rolls a number to see if the player will encounter an non playable character.
      static void Board.characterAttack(Characters firstChar, Characters enemyChar)
      Runs the calculations for the player's attack.
      static int Board.characterDefend(Characters firstChar, Characters enemyChar)
      Runs the calculation for whether the player block succeeded, partially succeeded or failed.
      static void Board.characterHeal(Characters firstChar)
      Runs the calculations that check if the player succeeded at healing or failed.
      static void Board.characterLevelUp(Characters firstChar, Characters enemyChar)
      Adds all things gained from the fight to the character (Experience and Gold).
      static void Board.checkEquip(Characters firstChar)
      Prints out the player's information: Name, current weapon, current armor, current level, max life points, current life points, strength level and attack level.
      static void Board.checkJobProgress(Characters firstChar, Characters enemyChar)
      After every fight, this method checks to see if the enemy defeated is one of the enemies in the current job(s) the player has, and if so it subtracts it from the total.
      static void Board.checkMap(Characters firstChar)
      Prints out the map with the player symbol in it.
      static void Board.checkSpecialEnemies(Characters firstChar, Characters enemyChar)
      Checks if the enemy defeated was a special enemy with a unique drop.
      static void Board.checkState(Characters firstChar)
      Runs calculations to check if the player will be allowed to more without encountering enemies, run into another character (WIP), or asked to start the end game quest.
      static void Board.createEnemy(Characters firstChar, int enemy)
      Creates the enemy the player will fight against.
      static void Board.createSpecialEnemy(Characters firstChar, int enemy, java.lang.String enemyName)
      Constructs special enemies, these enemies have special attributes that require different creation.
      static void Board.determineEnemy(Characters firstChar)
      Determines which enemy the player will go against, it checks if the player is high enough level to go against tougher enemies.
      static void Board.distributeSkillPoints(Characters firstChar, Characters enemyChar)
      Prompts the player to choose which attributes to distribute skill points in.
      Armor EventsHandling.getArmorDrop(java.lang.String[][] armorList, Characters enemyChar, Characters firstChar)
      Gets the armor the player received as a drop.
      static int Board.getCurrentTown(Characters firstChar)
      The player's current location gets compared to to the original map, and if the player is on top of a town (determined by the letters: E, H, D, O, A) it returns the corresponding value.
      static void Board.getJob(Characters firstChar, Towns currentTown)
      Communicates with the town class to create a job list that is populated with jobs that correspond to the race of the town.
      Weapons EventsHandling.getWeaponDrop(Characters enemyChar, Characters firstChar)
      Gets the weapon the player received as a drop.
      java.lang.String EventsHandling.healthPotDrop(Characters firstChar)
      Gets the amount of health potions the player got as a drop.
      MiscItems EventsHandling.miscItemDrop(Characters firstChar)
      Gets the miscellaneous item the player got.
      static void Board.questEngine(Characters firstChar, java.lang.String quest)
      Runs the script for the end game quest, gives the player the option to start it or wait.
      static void Board.questSelection(Characters firstChar)
      Gets a random quest from a quest array (as of right now 12/15/14 it only contains the end game quest).
      static void Board.travel(Characters firstChar)
      Method that covers the movement of the player in the map, along with access to all other menus.
      static void Board.visitInn(Characters firstChar, Towns currentTown)
      Communicates with town class to create an inn where the player can rest.
      static void Board.visitShop(Characters firstChar, Towns currentTown)
      Communicates with town class to create a shop that is populated with items that correspond to the race of the town.
